bioconda.name: bioconductor-siggenes
bioconda.summary: Multiple Testing using SAM and Efron's Empirical Bayes Approaches

biotools.summary: Identification of differentially expressed genes and estimation of the False Discovery Rate (FDR) using both the Significance Analysis of Microarrays (SAM) and the Empirical Bayes Analyses of Microarrays (EBAM).

bioschemas.name: siggenes
bioschemas.summary: Identification of differentially expressed genes and estimation of the False Discovery Rate (FDR) using both the Significance Analysis of Microarrays (SAM) and the Empirical Bayes Analyses of Microarrays (EBAM).
